CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Appraisal_Delivered_Date__c ), IF(ISBLANK( Appraisal_Waived_Date__c ), null, (Appraisal_Waived_Date__c + CASE( WEEKDAY(Appraisal_Waived_Date__c), 1, 3, 2, 3, 3, 3, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6, 5, 7, 5, 0) )), (Appraisal_Delivered_Date__c + CASE( WEEKDAY(Appraisal_Delivered_Date__c), 1, 3, 2, 3, 3, 3, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6, 5, 7, 5, 0) ))
CustomField.label: Earliest Closing Date
